articles.description: Traders are split over whether Biden's win is good or bad for Bitcoin.
articles.content:
Bye bye, Trump! Fake news media Decrypt was one of several media outlets to call the win for Democratic candidate Joe Biden today after he cinched the vote in Pennsylvania.
Trump argues that he won … [+1024 chars]

articles.title: Are self-employed and gig workers in Washington missing out on pandemic jobless benefits? - Seattle Times

articles.author: Katie Canales
articles.title: How Ant Group's $37 billion IPO dreams were dashed - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Experts told Business Insider that Jack Ma's incendiary comments blasting China's banking rules played a role in the nation's crackdown on Ant's IPO.
articles.content:
The Chinese fintech firm Ant Group has gone from flying under the radar to dominating headlines in recent months, and it's all thanks to its highly-anticipated IPO that was ready to go on Thursday.
… [+8533 chars]
